creator: Safe365
descriptionHtml:
Safe365 is an app designed to take care of your parents, grandparents and older relatives. When you need some extra help in their care, Safe365 can lend you a hand. Just download it for free and enjoy peace of mind knowing that your family is doing great.

How does Safe365 work?

Joining Safe365 is easy, and we will accompany you all the way:

1. Download the app for free
2. Verify your mobile phone number
3. Add your parents, grandparents, and other relatives as family members in Safe365.
4. They’ll receive a link to download the app on their mobile phones.
5. Your relatives must agree to share their activity. Without their consent, Safe365 won’t let you interact with them.
6. You're ready! You can now help, protect, and take care of your elders.


Why choose Safe365?

✓ Closer to your family

At Safe365, we believe that family is the most important thing. But we also know that our day to day is overwhelmed by a thousand pending things and often we don't have enough time to dedicate to our elders. This is why we provide a service to take care, protect, and create family ties with your elders from a distance.

✓ We adapt to your needs (coming soon)

To make it easier for your elders, you have two ways of visualizing our app: a complete view and a simplified one. You choose!

✓ Make your elder's heart light up (coming soon)

What if we share these significant moments with the ones we love the most? We offer you an easy and simple way to connect with your loved ones, whether it’s through a visit, a call, or simply by sharing your best photos and videos. Thanks to Safe365 you can make your grandparents enjoy your best adventures.

✓ Locate your family members at any time

With our real-time GPS locator, you can protect your elders no matter where you are. Believe it or not, knowing where they are in case they have any problem will give you peace of mind.

✓ Get a personalized window into their well-being

To guarantee the well-being of your elders, you can verify that their safety, health, and happiness are at their best through a personalized dashboard. Does your grandmother feel a little sad today? Send her a picture of you to increase her happiness.

✓ Your elders will receive alerts and reminders

Send daily reminders to your elders and make sure they accomplish all scheduled routines (physical activity, medication, doctor's appointments, ...). Does your grandfather often forget to take his medicine? Send him a reminder with Safe365.

✓ Discover near eldercare services straight from your mobile phone

We know that our elders have many needs that's why we provide you with a space where you’ll find the best eldercare options for your loved ones. Benefit from promotions and discounts available only for Safe365 users!

✓ Receive emergency alerts

If some problems arise, your elders can press our emergency button. In Spain and Andorra, this button is directly connected to the region's emergency services (112, RACC, Fire fighters) who will mobilize all the necessary resources according to the person's location. For other countries, the emergency button directly sends an alert to family members.

Your satisfaction is extremely important to us, so you can always reach us through the 'Contact us' section within the app or by clicking on the 'Help' button at www.safe365.com. Join the Safe365 community!
descriptionShort: Take care of your elderly relatives with the family locator Safe365 📲👴👵

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
4.4.3:
Time to update!
We have new features! Safe365 presents the new routine “Are you okay?”. With this new function, you will be much less worried in your day-to-day:
· Check that your relatives are well, thanks to the motion sensor.
· Receive notifications when no movement is detected by your family member’s phone.
· In case there is no movement, the person will receive an alert to confirm to their relatives that everything is okay.
If you have any doubt write us at support@safe365.com

title: Safe365❗Eldercare App, Routines, Locator and more

creator: Safe365
descriptionHtml:
Safe365 is an eldercare app designed to take care of your older relatives. When you need some extra help in their care, our senior safety app and health tracker can lend you a hand. Just download it for free and enjoy peace of mind knowing that your family is doing great.

How does Safe365 work?



Joining Safe365 is easy:

1. Download the app for free
2. Verify your mobile phone number
3. Add your parents, grandparents, and other relatives as family members in Safe365.
4. They’ll receive a link to download the app on their mobile phones.
5. Your relatives must agree to share their activity. Without their consent, Safe365 won’t let you locate family members nor interact with them.
6. You're ready! You can now help, protect, and take care of your elders.


TOP Safe365 features



✓ GPS Family Locator
With our real-time GPS location tracker, you can locate family members and protect your elders no matter where you are. Believe it or not, knowing where they are in case they have any problem will give you peace of mind.

* Note: To use Safe365, you need to allow the use of the device location in the background.

✓ Place Notification

Receive automated alerts when your family members arrive or leave home, work or any places you would like to set.

✓ Security, Happiness & Health tracker

Safe365 gives you an overview of the status of your relatives through a personalized dashboard. This dashboard collects data on the health, safety and happiness of your family. You can take actions within the app to improve the well-being of your family members. For example, if your grandma is feeling sad, send her a picture to increase her happiness.

✓ Gallery of photos and videos

Our senior safety app also offers an easy and simple way to create family ties and connect with your elders by sharing your best photos and videos. Thanks to Safe365 you can make your grandparents enjoy your best adventures.


✓ Emergency alerts

If some problems arise, your elders can press our sos button. Your family members will receive emergency alerts, when the 10-second countdown reaches 0.

✓ Eldercare Services


Search nursing homes by location or price, take advantage of exclusive discounts, send an email or call the residence directly through our senior safety app.


Press Mentions




“Safe365 Mobile App Ensures Elderly Parents Are Safe and Happy” - EconoTimes


Your satisfaction is extremely important to us, so you can always reach us through the 'Contact us' section within the app or by clicking on the 'Help' button at www.safe365.com. Join the Safe365 community!
descriptionShort: Safe365 - Eldercare App & GPS Location Tracker 📍🆘

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
6.0.0:

Safe365 is now Durcal!

Durcal is your new family app to take care of your elders and is adapted to them, so they can enjoy using it.

With Durcal you can:
- Check your elders' location, battery & coverage
- Send photos to be stored in their Family Memories
- Call from the app to increase their happiness

Your account remains the same, you will only need to choose if you are a carer or an elder and add your family members!

If you like Durcal, leave us a comment and rate it.

title: Safe365❗Eldercare App, Routines, Locator and more

creator: Safe365
descriptionHtml:
TAKE CARE OF YOUR ELDERS

Durcal is the family app to look after them, their happiness...and yours


FOLLOW THEIR DAY TO DAY

Check the location, battery and signal of their phones


DATA TO MEASURE HEALTH

Make sure they're in good shape with all the details of their physical activity:
Steps
Physical Activity
Heart Rate (coming soon)
Sleep Quality (coming soon)
Blood Oxygen (coming soon)
Body’s Energy (coming soon)


CONNECTED TO STAY TOGETHER

Keep on top of the calls and visits you make to your elders, and compete to rise in your family ranking

PHOTOS DO BRING HAPPINESS

Make them happy sharing photos with them


ADAPTED TO THEM

The Senior version of Durcal's design and functionality have been adapted so they can enjoy it as much as we do


¡Download Durcal!
descriptionShort: Elderly Connecting the Family

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
6.1.0:
Durcal is getting better!
Now you can add other Carers for your elders who aren’t yet registered.
Invite your family to download the app and take care of them together with Durcal.
Thanks for using Durcal! :blush:

title: Durcal - Eldercare & Location

creator: Safe365
descriptionHtml:
SECURITY IS PEACE OF MIND

Durcal is the free app to safely locate your family, children, seniors, and friends with the intelligent geolocation system. The app will notify you when they leave home, when they arrive at school, at work or if they run out of battery or coverage on their phones.

CONNECT THE WHOLE FAMILY

Bring your whole family together easily in a single application. With Durcal, your family and friends can send and receive photos, make calls and check if you have spent time together recently.

A FIT FAMILY

In the "Health" section, you can see your family's motion and fitness activity in detail, such as the steps they have taken and whether they have met their exercise goals. Besides, features such as a heart rate, sleep, blood oxygen, and body battery will be added soon.

USEFUL FOR EVERYONE

Durcal bridges the technology gap between seniors and younger people. The app includes a Simple View so that the seniors and children can connect with the family easily while getting the use of technology closer to everyone.

Download Durcal!
descriptionShort: Durcal is a free app to connect and care for the whole family.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
6.5.2:

You scratch my back and I’ll scratch yours!

This new Durcal update will make your family more connected than ever. Now you’ll stay in touch with your loved ones at any time. So, as you can look after them, they’ll do the same for you.

Thanks for using Durcal with your family!

USEFUL FOR EVERYONE

Durcal bridges the technology gap between seniors and younger people. The app includes a Simple View so that the seniors and children can connect with the family easily while getting the use of technology closer to everyone.

Download Durcal!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Tap to check what’s new!

This update is all about tapping buttons. We’ve added a help button to alert your whole family, in case of any emergency.

Moreover, we’ve redesigned the app, and now it’s much more intuitive. Log in and enjoy the new experience by tapping for yourself.

Another one you can’t miss, it’s the Add button. Now, you can create as many families as you want, and add your family members, or whoever you consider your family.

Thanks for using Durcal!

title: Durcal - Family Locator

creator: Durcal
descriptionHtml:
Durcal is the free GPS family tracker with map to find the location of your family and take care of the seniors, always with mutual consent.

Thanks to Durcal's intelligent geolocation system, you’ll be able to track on a map any location of the devices connected to the family. The Durcal GPS tracker allows you to keep your family connected, and will notify you when your loved ones leave home, arrive at school, work, doctor or even if they run out of battery or coverage on their phones.

Connect, find and take care of your family and seniors with Durcal, the free GPS family tracker app.


With Durcal you can send and receive photos, make calls or see if you've spent time together recently, so you can give your family the time they deserve.
Connect with your family and mates and gain peace of mind and security. Plus, you'll have your family close even if they're far away!

📍 LOCATION TRACKER - PRIVACY AND SECURITY:

Durcal is a powerful GPS family tracker that allows you to share your phone location with the circles of your choice to be easily located on a map. It only works with mutual consent and each member of the family or group decides whether to share their phone location in real time.

👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 FAMILY CONNECTED - WITH MANY FEATURES:

Durcal is much more than a system to track the location of your family members. It's a social tool to connect with your closest circles, post photos on the family album or make calls. Durcal will give you a ranking of time spent with your loved ones, so you can check if you invest enough time with them.

🆘 HELP BUTTON - ONLY FOR EMERGENCIES:

Receive an alert as a notification when a family member has an emergency and needs help. By tapping the help button, the whole family will receive a message to check the location of the family member before alerting the emergency services.

💗 FAMILY IN SHAPE - FAMILY HEALTH:
In the Durcal "Health" section, your family tracker, you can check the family members and seniors' fitness activity in detail, such as the steps taken and if they've met their fitness goals. In addition, features such as a heart rate, sleep, blood oxygen and body energy meter will be added soon, so you can check the family's fitness and health status at all times, especially the seniors in your family environment.

Durcal isn't just a family tracker with GPS location, it's also a healthcare tool to anticipate possible emergencies.

🌍 USEFUL FOR EVERYONE:

Durcal is suitable for seniors as well as children and young people with the aim of ensuring the app is accessible to the whole family. The app includes a simple view, so that everyone can connect with the family easily while bringing the benefits of a useful and safety technology closer to all audiences.

Download now Durcal, the GPS family tracker for the whole family, and connect and take care of your loved ones wherever they're!
